DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion give 2000 mg 14C-SLV334 via 1-hour infusion . The absolute bioavailability also determine .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate ADME 14C Labeled SLV334 After i.v . Infusion
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria healthy nonsmoking subject Exclusion Criteria QTc > 430 m ; positive drug screen
DOC.keyword: 14C label ADME ( Aborption Distribution Metabolism Elimination ) study
